application

Class Diary

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Diary

  • public class Diary
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all things that relate to an Employee's Diary. It stores all the meetings and also contains the Stack that keeps track of the recently performed actions.
    Author:
    Daniel
